name: Egg-Napper - Raptor Pack Scout
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Raptor Pack" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can add 1 "Raptor Pack" card or 1 "Selective Evolution" from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Raptor Pack" monsters or Reptile-Type monsters. You can only use the effect of "Egg-Napper - Raptor Pack Scout" once per turn.
